item.description:
A friend recommended this to me...sounds like a blast...

"The Happening‚Äù brings back to life the fabulous music and atmosphere of the 1960's & early 1970's. They are a six piece band dedicated to bringing back the sights, the sounds and the music of the greatest era of Rock n Roll music of all time.

Band starts around 9:30. We will meet a little earlier to grab a table and a bite to eat, but you are welcome to come anytime.

So c'mon out and practice those moves or just listen to those great sounds from the past.BTW, if you are interested, pool tables are available.

See you there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri Bruno or the Meetup sign...
item.name: "The Happening" @ Firehouse Bar and Grille in Plainville...
